thumb.name: Pretty Fan
thumb.verse: Add your own special whimsy and charm to all your gifts. whether they're wrapped in boxes or bags. Personalized package decorations add warmth to every occasion.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EYou'll Need:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPaper. 8 1/2 x 11 inches. Scissors. Glue or tape.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3COL%3E%3CLI%3EClick on %3CB%3EPersonalize and Print Your Project%3C/B%3E to open the Creative workspace. %3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EMake text changes as desired. %3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EClick %3Cb%3EPrint Project%3C/b%3E to send finished %3Cb%3EPackage Decoration%3C/b%3E to the printer. %3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3ECut%3C/b%3E along the solid. exterior lines. cutting out all design pieces. %3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EGlue or tape%3C/b%3E back panel to reverse side of front panel.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EFold%3C/b%3E along dotted lines. %3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3ECarefully %3Cb%3Ecut out%3C/b%3E the hole at the bottom center of the fan. %3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3ETie%3C/b%3E a string or ribbon through the hole. %3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EAttach%3C/b%3E completed Package Decoration to the present or bag handle. %3C/LI%3E%3C/ol%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPrint your project on scrap paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. Enhance the design with glitter paint or stickers.

thumb.name: Just for...
thumb.verse: Add your own special whimsy and charm to all your gifts. whether they're wrapped in boxes or bags. Personalized package decorations add warmth to every occasion.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EYou'll Need:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPaper. 8 1/2 x 11 inches. Scissors. Tape or glue. %3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3COL%3E%3CLI%3EClick on %3CB%3EPersonalize and Print Your Project%3C/B%3E to open the Creative workspace. %3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EMake text changes as desired. %3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EClick %3Cb%3EPrint Project%3C/b%3E to send finished %3Cb%3EPackage Decoration%3C/b%3E to the printer. %3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3ECut%3C/b%3E along the solid. exterior lines. cutting out all design pieces. %3Cb%3ECut slits%3C/b%3E along solid. interior lines on base piece. %3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EPosition%3C/b%3E matching face piece on top of the base piece. Then. %3Cb%3Efold%3C/b%3E at dotted lines on tabs at the side of the face piece. %3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EInsert%3C/b%3E face piece tabs into slits on the base piece. If needed. use tape or glue to %3Cb%3Esecure%3C/b%3E tabs to back of base piece. %3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3ECarefully %3Cb%3Ecut out%3C/b%3E the hole to the right of the dog's tale. %3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3ETie%3C/b%3E a string or ribbon through the hole. %3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EAttach%3C/b%3E completed Package Decoration to the present or bag handle. %3C/LI%3E%3C/ol%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPrint your project on scrap paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. Enhance the design with glitter paint or stickers.
